title: Constructivist Science Learning Design Utilizing Imagination-Based Education (IE) Theory

context.prior_knowledge: Foundational science knowledge and professional field experience
context.additional_context: Activity-based learning where medical/legal/technical experts reinterpret scientific concepts from cultural-historical perspectives in a BYOD environment.

learning_goals: Learners can design and execute at least three science activities that stimulate imagination in a constructivist environment
Learners can develop at least two creative cases connecting professional experiences with science concepts by applying IE (Information Processing) theory
Learners can collaboratively analyze knowledge-building processes with peer learners using activity theory-based assessment tools
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
